trans-unit.source: Module Builder
trans-unit.target: Module Builder

trans-unit.source: Owner Name:
trans-unit.target: Owner Name:

trans-unit.source: Developers are encouraged to use a unique namespace for their modules to avoid potential clashes with other developers. Specify the name of your organization or company and it will be used as a prefix.
trans-unit.target: Developers are encouraged to use a unique namespace for their modules to avoid potential clashes with other developers. Specify the name of your organization or company and it will be used as a prefix.

trans-unit.source: Module Name:
trans-unit.target: Module Name:

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the module.
trans-unit.target: A unique name for the module.

trans-unit.source: Description:
trans-unit.target: Description:

trans-unit.source: Optionally provide a description for the module.
trans-unit.target: Optionally provide a description for the module.

trans-unit.source: Language:
trans-unit.target: Language:

trans-unit.source: Select your preferred language for developing the module.
trans-unit.target: Select your preferred language for developing the module.

trans-unit.source: C#
trans-unit.target: C#

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic

trans-unit.source: Template:
trans-unit.target: Template:

trans-unit.source: Select your preferred module development template. Module development templates are stored in the Modules subfolder within the Host Root folder.
trans-unit.target: Select your preferred module development template. Module development templates are stored in the Modules subfolder within the Host Root folder.

trans-unit.source: Control Name:
trans-unit.target: Control Name:

trans-unit.source: Enter a unique name for the module control.
trans-unit.target: Enter a unique name for the module control.

trans-unit.source: Create Module
trans-unit.target: Create Module

trans-unit.source: You must provide the Owner Name and Module Name and select a Module Template.
trans-unit.target: You must provide the Owner Name and Module Name and select a Module Template.

trans-unit.source: You must be a Super User to create new modules.
trans-unit.target: You must be a Super User to create new modules.

trans-unit.source: A module already exists with the name specified.
trans-unit.target: A module already exists with the name specified.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when reading the selected module template files.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred when reading the selected module template files.
